paper_abstract: In this paper, new L-T-2, L-Urysohn, and L-completely Hausdorff axioms are introduced in L-topological spaces. Relations between these axioms are established. The L-extended real line and its subspaces, as well as pointwise metric spaces, satisfy these axioms. (C) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A new approach to L-T-2, L-Urysohn, and L-completely Hausdorff axioms
